CmdLine: apt-get update     && apt-get install -y git     && apt-get install -y zsh     && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh.git ~/.oh-my-zsh     && cp ~/.oh-my-zsh/templates/zshrc.zsh-template ~/.zshrc     && echo "bindkey '^R' history-incremental-pattern-search-backward" >> ~/.zshrc     && chsh -s /bin/zsh     && apt-get clean     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
